text: قالوا۟ انا ارسلنا الى قوم مجرمين

translations.translation: They said, 'We have been sent to a people of evildoers
They said: "We have been sent to a wicked people
They replied: “Behold, we have been sent to a wicked people
They replied, "We have been sent to a sinful people
They said, “We have been sent towards a guilty nation.”
They said: "We have been sent to a people who are criminals."
They said: Surely we are sent to a guilty people,
They said, 'We have been sent to a people of sinners,
They said: Lo! we are sent unto a guilty folk,
They replied, "We have been sent to a sinful people,
They said: verily we are sent Unto a people, guilty.
They said, ‘We have been sent toward a guilty people,
They said, "We have been sent to a people (deep) in sin;-
They said: "We have been sent to a people who are Mujrimun (polytheists, sinners, criminals, disbelievers in Allah);
They replied: 'We are sent to a sinful nation,
They said, “We are sent to a people guilty of sin.”
They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals
[51:32] They said, ‘Lo! we have been sent to a guilty folk, disbelievers — these were the people of Lot —
(They said: Lo! we are sent unto a guilty folk) idolatrous folk who brought ruin upon themselves because of engaging in an abominable act; referring here to the folk of Lot,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ قَالُوۤاْ إِنَّآ أُرْسِلْنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِينَ } [الذاريات: 32] أقبح الجرائم وأفحش المنكرات
 يعنون: قوم لوط عليه السلام المبالغين في الفعلة الشنيعة
 والديدنة القبيحة المتناهية في القبح والفحش

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: أو لهما؟ { قالوا إِنا أُرسلنا إِلى قوم مجرمين } أي: قوم لوط
